name: One Tree
description: There's only one tree left on earth and its up to you to keep it alive until it drops its seeds. HOW TO PLAY~~~    WASD or Arrow keys to move. 1 and 2 to change item slots.  Click on water sources with a bucket to fill your bucket. Click on the tree with a full bucket to water it. Click on an enemy with a full bucket to kill it. You win if you reach level five
